pmo.project.planning.and.project.control: PMO - PROJECT PLANNING AND PROJECT CONTROL
about.us.detail: JL Proyectos has been providing professional services in industrial project management, architectural designs, and civil, electromechanical, and control works.
about.us.detailtwo: We offer our services by making available to our clients highly specialized professionals and technicians with extensive experience.
projects.info: This is a sample of our extensive portfolio of projects that we have built over these 19 years.
contact_us.detail: If you are interested in any of our services and would like more information, in this section, we will request some details, and one of our representatives will contact you.
